pages.text: A $(item)Sniffer Egg$() is a block that can be brushed out of $(l:rare/suspicious_sand)$(item)Suspicious Sand$() in $(l:world/structures#ruin)$(thing)Warm Ocean Ruins$(), or obtained by breeding two $(l:creatures/animal-sniffer)$(thing)Sniffers$(). $(br2)It slowly hatches into a $(l:creatures/animal-sniffer)$(thing)Snifflet$() when placed as a block in the world, which takes half as much time when it is placed on a $(item)Moss block$().
